document_data.mainbody:
he Lions Share was a store in Triboar in the late 15 century DR.
It was recently purchased and refurbished by the Lionshield Coster company by 1485 DR. The companys trademark, a polished shield emblazoned with the head of a stylized golden lion over a blue background hung above the stores entrance.
Narth Tezrin and Alaestra Ulgar ran the business and were paid well by the company.
